amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-110 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, and 11.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, and 11 printed in Part B of House Report 117-110.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 207 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Ryan.
